Description.Text: Aonang orchid resort is located on the way to aonang beach, just 1 minute walk to the beach and 30 km from krabi airport. Hotel has 52 lavish guest room 13 grand pool villa with Jacuzzi and 39 grand deluxe rooms. Fully furnished and equipped with modern facilities. All rooms with private balcony /terrace and bathtub.
Aonang orchid resort is located on the way to aonang beach, Just 100 meters from the beach 30 km from krabi airport. Here one can enjoy and relax in an atmosphere of fantastic natural surrounding.

Grand Pool villa - Room with double/single/twin bed includes Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Balcony / Terrace, Bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable\satellite TV, CD player only pool view, clothes dryer, color TV, DVD player only pool villa, ensuite \ private bathroom, hairdryer, iron\ironing board, laundry service, mini bar, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and valet service.
Grand Deluxe Pool View - Room with double/single/twin bed includes Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Balcony / Terrace, Bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable\satellite TV, CD player only pool view, clothes dryer, color TV, DVD player only pool villa, ensuite \ private bathroom, hairdryer, iron\ironing board, laundry service, mini bar, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and valet service.,Bathroom amenities,Cable / Satellite TV,CD player Only pool villa,Clothes dryer,Color TV,DVD player only pool villa,Ensuite /Private bathroom ,Iron / Ironing board,Laundry service,Refrigerator,Room service ,Safe in room,Shaver in bathroom,Tea and coffee making facilities,Valet service. The building room face the swimming pool and panoramic hill side view fully facilities in room, bathtub,safety box in room air-condition hot shower hair dryer minibar telephone.
Grand Deluxe city view - Room with double/single/twin bed includes Air conditioning, Alarm clock, Balcony / Terrace, Bathrobe, bathroom amenities, cable\satellite TV, CD player only pool view, clothes dryer, color TV, DVD player only pool villa, ensuite \ private bathroom, hairdryer, iron\ironing board, laundry service, mini bar, refrigerator, room service, safe in room, shaver in bathroom, tea and coffee making facilities, telephone and valet service.
